decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The use of the building as a school (Use Class D1) hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the building restored to its former use as an office (Use Class B1) on or before 31st December 2014.
Condition : 2 - The number of pupils attending the school hereby approved shall be limited to a maximum of 240 at any time.
Condition : 3 - The school hereby approved shall be operated in accordance with the Reach Academy Travel Plan 2012-2014 unless the Local Planning Authority gives written consent to any variation.

Condition : 4 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/01 P01; 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/02 P01;  6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/03 P01; 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/04 P01; 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/05 P01; 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/06 P01; 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/07 P01; 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/08 P01; 6APF007/BRIDGE/A.01A/09 P01 (received 02/09/2014) submitted  therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Variation of Condition 1 (reversion to office use) to allow the continued use until 31st December 2014 of planning permission 00553/J/P2 dated 06/06/2013 for the temporary change of use from job centre to School (Use class D1 Education).
